@eekz wrote:

you cant but delete that object and add a new alter were you want it

ok here i go agian

add this void and edit the cords bit

public void deletethatobject(int objectX, int objectY) { ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, 6951, -1, 10); } public void whatever() { deletethatobject( xcords here,ycords here); }

then add this under ure global objects tut

public void watever1() { makeGlobalObject(x cords, y cords, object id, 0, 10);// }

and then search for

public boolean process

and ad this in it

watever(); watever1();
